DOC.criteria: healthy woman age 1840 body mass index 18.529.9kg/m2 eat breakfast regularly nonsmoking take weight loss medication nondieting ( weight stable past 3 month ) speak write English literacy . antibiotic use within past 6 month cardiovascular disease diabetes mellitus cancer past 5 year renal hepatic disease recent bacterial infection gastrointestinal condition affect digestion absorption weight loss > 5kg prior 3 month ( intentional unintentional ) history drug alcohol abuse prior 6 month food allergy high fiber intake ( 3 serving high fiber food per day ) lipidlowering , antihypertensive antiinflammatory steroid medication use restrain eater ( score > 10 dietary restraint factor Three Factor Eating Questionnaire ) concurrent recent ( within 30 day ) participation intervention study .
